name: Found Item Management
description:
As a Columbia University student
  I want to report and manage found items
  So that I can help reunite lost items with their owners

steps.name: I fill in "Description" with "Black iPhone with clear case"
I should be on the dashboard page
I should see "Found item posted successfully"
I have posted a phone item
I visit the found items page
I should see "Black iPhone with clear case"
I have posted a phone item
I visit the found items page
I should see "Item marked as returned"
someone has posted a phone item
I visit the found items page
I should see "Black iPhone with clear case"

name: Lost Item Management
description:
As a Columbia University student
  I want to report and manage my lost items
  So that others can help me find them

steps.name: I fill in "Description" with "Black iPhone with clear case"
I should be on the dashboard page
I should see "Lost item posted successfully"
I have posted a phone item
I visit the lost items page
I should see "Black iPhone with clear case"
I have posted a phone item
I visit the lost items page
I fill in "Description" with "Black iPhone with clear case and Columbia sticker"
I should see "Lost item updated successfully"
I have posted a phone item
I visit the lost items page
I should see "Item marked as found"

name: User Registration and Login
description:
As a Columbia University student
  I want to create an account and log in
  So that I can use the FoundIt platform

steps.name: I am on the home page
I should be on the dashboard page
I should see "Welcome back, New Student"
I am on the home page
I should be on the dashboard page
I should see "Welcome back, Student User"
I am on the home page
I should see "Invalid email or password"

name: User Profile Management
description:
As a Columbia University student
  I want to manage my profile and view other users
  So that I can build trust and connect with the community

steps.name: I fill in "Bio" with "Computer Science student"
